home.title: Use Jelpost to get your delivery fast
home.content: Jelpost helps you track, manage, and receive parcels faster — with full transparency and local support.
home.title-2: We made thousands of customers happy with our services.

features.title: Why Choose Jelpost?
features.subtitle: We combine technology and logistics to provide the best shipping experience.

fast.title: Fast Delivery
fast.desc: Optimized routes to ensure your packages arrive on time, every time.

secure.title: Secure Handling
secure.desc: We treat every package with care, ensuring it reaches you in perfect condition.

tracking.title: Real-time Tracking
tracking.desc: Know exactly where your shipment is at every step of the journey.

prices.title: Competitive Prices
prices.desc: Best rates in the market for both land and air delivery options.

marketplaces.title: Shop from Top Marketplaces
marketplaces.subtitle: We deliver from all major Chinese e-commerce platforms directly to your doorstep.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Simple steps to get your packages from China to Kazakhstan.

step1.title: 1. Register
step1.desc: Create an account to get your personal warehouse address in China.

step2.title: 2. Shop Online
step2.desc: Buy from Taobao, Pinduoduo, or any other store using your new address.

step3.title: 3. Send to Warehouse
step3.desc: The seller ships your goods to our warehouse. We receive and check them.

step4.title: 4. Receive in Almaty
step4.desc: We deliver your package to Almaty. Pick it up or get home delivery.

info.title: Information Center
info.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Jelpost.

rules.title: Rules for receiving goods
rules.desc: You need to register your personal data in the Jelpost application.

faq.title: Top Questions
faq.desc: Jelpost is a Kazakhstani IT logistics company delivering parcels from China.

account.title: Personal Account, Bonuses
account.desc: How do I top up my personal account?

order.title: Order
order.desc: My product is not showing up in the Jana Post app, why?

return.title: Return
return.desc: In this article you will learn how to make a return.

cta.title: Ready to start shipping?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of happy customers who trust Jelpost for their delivery needs.

hero.title: Become a Jelpost Partner
hero.subtitle: Join our growing network of logistics partners. Earn additional income by opening a pickup point in your city.

benefits.title: Why Partner with Us?
benefits.subtitle: We offer a mutually beneficial partnership model designed to help you succeed.

income.title: Additional Income
income.desc: Earn commission on every package processed through your point.

customers.title: New Customers
customers.desc: Increase foot traffic to your existing business with Jelpost clients.

territory.title: Exclusive Territory
territory.desc: Be the only authorized partner in your specific district or area.

growth.title: Business Growth
growth.desc: Grow with us as e-commerce continues to expand rapidly.

steps.title: How to Become a Partner?
steps.subtitle: Three simple steps to start your journey with Jelpost.

step1.title: 1. Prepare Premises
step1.desc: Ensure your location meets our branding and operational standards.

step2.title: 2. Training
step2.desc: Complete our comprehensive training program for partners.

step3.title: 3. Activation
step3.desc: Sign the agreement and start accepting shipments immediately.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.subtitle: What we look for in our potential partners.

premises.title: Premises Requirements
list: Ground floor location with easy access

form.title: Leave a Request
form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we will contact you shortly.
form.name: Full Name

tracking.title: Track Your Shipment
tracking.subtitle: Enter your tracking number below to see the current status of your shipment.

tariffs.title: Tariffs
tariffs.subtitle: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Choose the route that suits you best.

calculator.title: Shipping Calculator
calculator.description: Calculate the estimated cost for {type} delivery. Price: ${price} / {unit}.

footer.description: Your reliable partner for fast and secure logistics from China to Central Asia.
